name: Dungeon Hunter 3
summary: Dungeon Hunter III is an action role-playing action game similar to Diablo and Dungeon Siege, in which you will have to choose among the four available classes (Warlord, Astromancer, Trickster, or Shaman) and hack your way through as many dungeons as you can, while assassinating as many enemies that get in your way and collecting as much gold and trinkets as you can.
